main.name: Connor Carson
main.description: with a passion for thrill-seeking, story writing, and TTRPGs on the side
main.bio: A recent IT Innovation graduate from the University of Nebraska at Omaha, I love to work with ReactJs, Angular, and UX/UI design whenever possible. I am currently seeking work involving website and web app projects. The most satisfying part of the project experience is creating a useful and worthwhile product for the user. I enjoy connecting with clients and working towards a solution as a team, collaborating with others to fulfill our goals and deadlines.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to contact me using the following channels:

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in IT Innovation
education.description: UNO was the perfect learning environment to start my journey as a developer. It connected me with other people my age but also helped expose me to the greater tech community in America.

work.title: Junior Software Developer
work.description: My most influential work experience to date, First Data (now Fiserv) trained me in full-development teams and allowed me to apply the sprint methodologies that I now use today.

work.title: IT Technician
work.description: A great opportunity to learn about responsibility, my work with the Koraleski Lab helped grow my abilities as a leader.

work.title: OSS Information Technology Member
work.description: My first tech experience, Union Pacific first exposed to a professional business environment. Supporting other employees and assisting my department allowed me to learn a broad range of inter-personal skills.
